%!TeX jobNames = bibtex, biber
\documentclass{article}

\usepackage[backend=\jobname]{biblatex}
\usepackage{imakeidx}

\bibliography{foo}{}
\makeindex

\begin{document}
  \PackageWarning{bar}{Package issue}
  foo, wibble, wibble \cite{wibble}, \index{gronk}.
  \printbibliography
  \printindex
\end{document}
